name: Grym Wonder
description:
Grym Wonder — a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelike elements.



Your kingdom has been captured by evil spirits, the last hero has fallen and the enemy is triumphant. Thanks to the Court Mage, you can return to battle countless times in any of the heroic guises and avenge your home. Fight, collect resources, improve skills and weapons for victory.



Court magician's tips:
Time is your main enemy; every minute the enemy becomes stronger and faster.
Fully upgraded weapons and relics in the right combination will give you an incredible advantage in battle.
Runes will strengthen you, and battle cries will help you get more gold.
Reset purchased upgrades to try new combinations - it's free.
Don't lock yourself in tight spaces. More enemies - more experience.



Good luck!
